import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BsDropdownConfig } from 'ngx-bootstrap/dropdown'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'], providers: [{ provide: BsDropdownConfig, useValue: { isAnimated: true, autoClose: true } }] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } }
